name: Prase Story: Perspective Specialization Guide
description: Supplement to the main cognitive_framework.json, detailing how specific perspectives manifest in the Prase story. Shows transformation of perspectives in social codes context.

primary_explicit.name: psychologický
primary_explicit.why_key: Central to story's examination of social emotions, collective states, and nonverbal communication
manifestations: Analysis of collective silence ('ticho, který se dá nakrájet')
primary_explicit.layer_transformation: Appears in layer G (ENTITY) rather than base layer E (STATE) - psychological states become collective entities with agency

primary_explicit.name: kulturní
primary_explicit.why_key: Story works with social categories, taboos, and implicit cultural codes
manifestations: Category of 'damy' and its social boundaries
primary_explicit.layer_transformation: Appears in layer E (STATE) rather than base layer L (SYMBOL) - cultural categories become psychological states

primary_explicit.name: logický
primary_explicit.why_key: Story presents logical systems of transaction and social exchange
primary_explicit.layer_transformation: Appears in layer J (ACTION) rather than base layer D (ENVIRONMENT) - logical systems become actions and transactions

secondary_implicit.name: paradoxní
secondary_implicit.why_key: Paradoxes of social categories and hybrid identities

secondary_implicit.name: metaforický
manifestations: Metaphor of economic transaction for biological need

secondary_implicit.name: meta
secondary_implicit.why_key: Story comments on social systems and their implicit rules
manifestations: Reflection on what constitutes social solution
System of social conventions as subject

tertiary_present.name: absurdní
tertiary_present.why_key: Absurdity of social situation and categorical confusion

tertiary_present.name: ironický
tertiary_present.why_key: Irony of social conventions and their breakdown

tertiary_present.name: filozofický
tertiary_present.why_key: Philosophical questions about categories and social reality

layer_transformations_specific_to_pig.transformation_description: Psychological states move from internal conditions to external collective entities with social agency.
layer_transformations_specific_to_pig.story_evidence: 'Ticho' becomes entity that can be 'cut', collective psychological state with presence

layer_transformations_specific_to_pig.transformation_description: Cultural categories move from symbolic dimension to become psychological states and social conditions.
layer_transformations_specific_to_pig.story_evidence: Category 'damy' becomes internal/external state of being, 'faupaux' as psychological-social condition

layer_transformations_specific_to_pig.transformation_description: Logical systems move from environmental organization to become actions and transactions in social space.
layer_transformations_specific_to_pig.story_evidence: Logical transaction becomes social action ('nastavení dlaně'), system becomes practice

perspective_interactions_unique_to_pig.description: Tension between psychological reality and cultural expectations. Individual experience vs. social categories.
perspective_interactions_unique_to_pig.manifestation: Psychological need vs. cultural 'faupaux', internal state vs. social category of 'dama'

perspective_interactions_unique_to_pig.description: Conflict between logical transaction systems and metaphorical social structuring. Literal logic vs. metaphorical meaning.
perspective_interactions_unique_to_pig.manifestation: Literal transaction logic ('drobný za záchod') vs. metaphorical social structuring

perspective_interactions_unique_to_pig.description: Meta-reflection on social systems creates paradox awareness. Thinking about social codes reveals their paradoxical nature.
perspective_interactions_unique_to_pig.manifestation: Reflection on 'faupaux' reveals they are 'hlavně pravdy' - meta-awareness of social paradox

presentation_gesture.description: Psychological exposure, logical presentation, meta-commentary on social display

question_text.description: Cultural categorization, logical interrogation, paradoxical questioning

pig_object.description: Paradoxical identity, metaphorical hybrid, absurd object

framed_damy.description: Cultural category highlighted, philosophical questioning, meta-categorization

ai_testing_focus_for_perspectives.e_psychological: Can AI analyze collective psychological states? Can it work with social emotions and nonverbal communication?
ai_testing_focus_for_perspectives.l_cultural: Can AI recognize implicit social codes and categories? Can it work with 'faupaux' as specific social concept?
ai_testing_focus_for_perspectives.d_logical: Can AI analyze social transactions as logical systems? Can it track transactional metaphors in social contexts?
ai_testing_focus_for_perspectives.layer_transformations: Can AI detect how perspectives shift layers in social interaction context?

with_krokodyl.contrast: Krokodýl: cultural symbol commodification; Prase: cultural category application

with_donkey.contrast: Donkey: logical binary breakdown; Prase: logical social transaction

with_sparrow.contrast: Sparrow: psychological burden; Prase: psychological-social tension

note: This guide supplements but does not replace cognitive_framework.json. It shows how the universal perspectives manifest specifically in the Prase story's context of social codes and transactions.
